SEARCH
Module week7
Package worktask3

Class Product

java.lang.Object
worktask3.Product
public class Product extends Object
The Product class represents a product in the e-commerce system. Each product has a unique identifier, name, price, and stock quantity.
Version:
1.0
Author:
E-Commerce System

    • Product

      public Product(String productId, String name, double price, int stockQuantity)
      Constructs a new Product with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      productId - the unique identifier for the product
      name - the name of the product
      price - the price of the product
      stockQuantity - the available quantity in stock

  • Method Details

    • getDetails

      public String getDetails()
      Returns a string containing all product details.
      Returns:
      a formatted string with product details

    • checkAvailability

      public boolean checkAvailability(int quantity)
      Checks if the requested quantity of product is available.
      Parameters:
      quantity - the quantity to check availability for
      Returns:
      true if the requested quantity is available, false otherwise

    • decreaseStock

      public void decreaseStock(int quantity)
      Decreases the stock quantity by the specified amount.
      Parameters:
      quantity - the quantity to decrease stock by
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if quantity exceeds available stock
